title: Styling In Vue.js
summary: There are various ways to attach styles on elements in Vue.js. Here, I'm going to explain the methods for binding to the `class` and `style` attributes.

title: Git Commands I Currently Use

title: Coders by Clive Thompson – Review – Part 1
summary: I encourage every programmer to read Coders by Clive Thompson. This book captures how coders were first introduced to technology, then into a vast range of occupations, and how we got to where we are now.

title: My first experience with Linux (installing lubuntu)
summary: I've always used Windows. There really was no reason. It's just that the computers I've owned came with it and it's what I knew how to use the most. My knowledge with Linux was so small it was negligible. I only knew that it was open source and there were many different kinds to choose from (known as distributions, or "distros").

title: Installing Programs on Linux
summary: Once I installed Linux Mint, I tried to install 2 programs just to learn how it's done in Linux. I know it's not as easy as running an executable, so this is what this post is about.
